DOC.brief_title: Erlotinib , Gemcitabine Nab-Paclitaxel Advanced Pancreatic Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: This single-arm , phase 1b study determine maximum tolerate dose ( MTD ) combination erlotinib ( daily ) , gemcitabine ( weekly ) , nab-paclitaxel ( weekly ) patient advanced pancreatic cancer .
